issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `Try(string)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:
Function Try(string) retrieves the transaction origin (tx.origin) using the ORIGIN opcode. Use msg.sender instead.
See also: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/security-considerations.html#tx-origin
issues.title: Use of tx.origin

issues.description:
In the function `StopGame()` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to msg.sender.

There is a check on storage index 1. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `ActivateContract(bytes32,string,string)`.
issues.title: Ether send
